basic.title: Title BGM
basic.description: Song played when first booting up the game.

basic.title: Samus Appears Jingle
basic.description: Song played when first appearing on-screen after starting a file or after a death, before you can start moving. Does not loop and plays for about 6 seconds.

basic.title: Silence
basic.description: Song played in rooms where you receive a major item.

basic.title: Get Item Jingle
basic.description: Song played when you retrieve an item. Does not loop and plays for 4 seconds.

basic.title: Zebetite
basic.description: Song played in Mother Brain's Room where the Zebetites reside.

basic.title: Escape
basic.description: Song played after defeating Mother Brain, during the self-destruct sequence, racing to the end of the game.
